{"id":787881710,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1661939158,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"19 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/787881710/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        unordered_map<char,int> lastOccurrence;\n        int maxLength = 0;\n        int startIndex = 1;\n        int currLength = 0;\n        int n = s.size();\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            if (!lastOccurrence[s[i]]) {\n                currLength++;\n                lastOccurrence[s[i]] = i + 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                if (lastOccurrence[s[i]] >= startIndex) {\n                    maxLength = max(maxLength, currLength);\n                    startIndex = lastOccurrence[s[i]] + 1;\n                    currLength = i - startIndex + 2;\n                    lastOccurrence[s[i]] = i + 1;\n                }\n                else {\n                    currLength++;\n                    lastOccurrence[s[i]] = i + 1;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        maxLength = max(maxLength, currLength);\n        return maxLength;\n    }\n};\n/*\np w w k e w\n0 1 2 3 4 5 -> i\n1 2 3 4 5 6 -> startIndex\n\ni = 0 {\n    lastOccurrence = {} to {('p':1)};\n    currLength = 0 to 1;\n    startIndex = 1;\n}\ni = 1 {\n    lastOccurrence = {('p':1)} to {('p':1), ('w':2)};\n    currLength = 1 to 2;\n    startIndex = 1;\n\n}\ni = 2 {\n    lastOccurrence = {('p':1), ('w':2)} to {('p':1), ('w':3)}\n}\n*/","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
